source:
%%sql
drop table if exists odw_workspace_db.sap_hr_layer1_harmonised;
create table odw_workspace_db.sap_hr_layer1_harmonised as 
SELECT
        SHR.Pers_No
        ,case LEFT( SHR.Pers_No, 2)
		when '50' then case char_length(SHR.Pers_No) 
			when 6 then  SHR.Pers_No
			else substring(cast( SHR.Pers_No as varchar(50)), 3, char_length(cast( SHR.Pers_No as varchar(50))))
				end
			else  SHR.Pers_No
					end as PINS_Join_staff_number
        ,case when SHR.PS_group = 'BAND 1' and SHR.Contract_Type = 'Fixed Term Contract' then 'FTC-B1'
		  when SHR.PS_group = 'BAND 2' and SHR.Contract_Type = 'Fixed Term Contract' then 'FTC-B2'
		  when SHR.PS_group = 'BAND 3' and SHR.Contract_Type = 'Fixed Term Contract' then 'FTC-B3'
		  when SHR.PS_group = 'BAND 1' and SHR.Contract_Type <> 'Fixed Term Contract' then 'B1'
		  when SHR.PS_group = 'BAND 2' and SHR.Contract_Type <> 'Fixed Term Contract' then 'B2'
		  when SHR.PS_group = 'BAND 3' and SHR.Contract_Type <> 'Fixed Term Contract' then 'B3'
		  else SHR.PS_group end as PINS_join_grade
        ,Pers_No as pins_staff_number
		,First_name  given_names
        ,Last_name family_name
        ,Employment_Status active_status
		,ROUND(SHR.FTE,2) FTE
		,case 
              when SHR.Position1 = 'Inspector Manager' then 1 
             else 0 end as is_sgl
		,SHR.Work_Contract
		,case SHR.Work_Contract
	        when 'Non-Sal. Inspec' then 'Non-Salaried Inspector'
	        else SHR.Organizational_Unit
	    end as resource_code
		,case left(SHR.PS_group, 3)
		when 'FTC' then 'FTC'
		when 'NSI' then 'NSI'
		else 'Salaried'		
	    end as emp_type ,
		PDAC_ETL_Date         	
	FROM odw_standardised_db.sap_hr as SHR
	where PDAC_ETL_Date > (select LastRun from odw_config_db.pipeline_runs where sourceName ='sap_hr' )	;

%%sql
merge into odw_config_db.pipeline_runs target
using (select 'sap_hr' as source_name , max(PDAC_ETL_Date ) as max_PDAC_ETL_Date from odw_workspace_db.sap_hr_layer1_harmonised ) updates
on target.sourceName=updates.source_name
WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET target.LastRun = updates.max_PDAC_ETL_Date
WHEN NOT MATCHED
  THEN INSERT (sourceName,LastRun) VALUES (source_name, max_PDAC_ETL_Date)
